info.description: Zwiki is a powerful, innovative, user-friendly wiki engine based on the Zope 2 platform. This project has been developed since 1999 by Simon Michael and contributors around the world, and powers many Zope and non-Zope-related wikis.
info.keywords: zope wiki cms restructuredtext html dtml
info.name: Zwiki
